name: Street War: Basketball
description:
Play real street basketball in 2017’s most exciting and popular free mobile basketball game. Play free basketball games in real time with friendly basketball stars and b-ball rivals from around the world! Show off your street basketball moves and unique street style. The world is your basketball court – become the next street basketball star!

o Play real-time basketball free online. It only takes 5 seconds to find a basketball team and 3 minutes to play a streetball game. Become a basketball star and play free b-ball with your friends and rivals anywhere, any time.

o Challenge yourself with varied PVP basketball games: 3 minute 1on1 challenges, real street basketball games and free team b-ball battles. Pick your squad and hit the basketball court!

o Use a virtual joystick and buttons to control your basketball stars. Control your dribble, slam dunk, rebound and shoot: touch response is much better than on a PC. Take 30 seconds to learn this b-ball game and the entire world will be your street basketball court!

o Experience real basketball and hip-hop street style with multiple basketball stars, basketball courts, tattoos, fashions and more!

o Slam dunk, unleash your crossover dribble or shoot a fade-away! Choose your combination of over 50 real street basketball skills. What kind of basketball star will you create?
